articles.author: Sareen Habeshian
articles.title: Americans largely disapprove of U.S. involvement in Israel and Iran war: Poll - Axios
articles.description: 60% of Americans think the U.S. military should not get involved in the conflict between Israel and Iran.
articles.content:
• He's leaving the door open to a diplomatic solution in the coming days that could avert a major escalation in the Middle East, Axios' Barak Ravid reports.

articles.author: Mary Schlangenstein, Leen Al-Rashdan
articles.title: American, United Pause Middle East Flights on Rising Tension - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: American Airlines Group Inc. suspended daily flights from the US to the capital of Qatar, while United Airlines Holdings Inc. paused service to Dubai because of military actions and heightened tensions in the Middle East.
